# tailor_function_registry (Resource)

The function_registry resource represents a registered JavaScript function in the function registry. Functions are versioned by content - each unique script creates a new version.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of this function. This must be unique within the workspace and follow the pattern ^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_-]*$.
- `workspace_id` (String) The ID of the workspace that the function registry belongs to.

### Optional

- `description` (String) An optional description of the function.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels for this function registry entry.
- `script` (String, Sensitive) The JavaScript code for this function. Each update with different content creates a new version. Mutually exclusive with script_path.
- `script_path` (String) Path to the JavaScript file. The file is read and streamed in chunks without loading the entire content into memory. Mutually exclusive with script.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the resource.
- `script_size_bytes` (Number) The size of the script in bytes.
